sizes.desc: Breakpoints (in pixels); Syntax: { sm: Number, md: Number, lg: Number, xl: Number }

lt.desc: Tells if current screen width is lower than breakpoint-name; Syntax: { sm: Boolean, md: Boolean, lg: Boolean, xl: Boolean }
examples: { sm: false, md: true, lg: true, xl: true }

gt.desc: Tells if current screen width is greater than breakpoint-name; Syntax: { xs: Boolean, sm: Boolean, md: Boolean, lg: Boolean }
examples: { xs: true, sm: true, md: false, lg: false, xl: false }

xs.desc: Current screen width fits exactly 'xs' breakpoint

sm.desc: Current screen width fits exactly 'sm' breakpoint

md.desc: Current screen width fits exactly 'md' breakpoint

lg.desc: Current screen width fits exactly 'lg' breakpoint

xl.desc: Current screen width fits exactly 'xl' breakpoint

breakpoints.desc: Syntax (pick what you want to override): { xs: Number, sm: Number, md: Number, lg: Number, xl: Number }

setDebounce.desc: Debounce update of all props when screen width/height changes
